AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Heal 25% HP upon selection.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: The fairies protect our employees. Everything will be peaceful while you are under the fairies' care.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Don't worry, now! We'll take good care of you.
Don't be alarmed. We're here to protect you.
Fairies are sacred beings, you know. Have some confidence.
You're a good-hearted lover of nature, you deserve our care.
You're the special one. The others should reflect on themselves.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: For 5 Scenes, heal 10% HP at the end of the Scene. After taking 3 hits, lose 25% of the current HP and lose this effect.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: The fairies were no more than carnivorous monsters, and their "protection" was their method to keep the meat fresh.

Dialogues.Dialogue: The reason we're staying by your side? Of course it's to protect you!
Enjoy the fairies' care to your heart's content.
A good person like you shouldn't die at the hands of anyone else.
We won't harm you, as long as you don't do anything evil.
Are you doubting us? That's a wicked thought you have…

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Take 1 more damage from attacks. On death, the killer takes 4 more damage from attacks for the rest of the Scene.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: However, the curse continues eternally, never broken.

Dialogues.Dialogue: This curse will never be lifted. It'll just…
Every moment will be agonizing until I finally die.
I will wait… Wait until you set me free from this curse.
The curse of the greedy will never be broken. It will only repeat…
Now you'll hope as well. That you want to end this cycle of the curse…

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Each die is enhanced at a 50% chance. Lose 1-2 HP every time the character rolls a die.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: "Every moment of my life is pain. I'd rather die than suffer for eternity."

Dialogues.Dialogue: I can't do this on my own… Someone has to help me.
I'm so hideous and gross, I can't stand it.
Why won't you help me? I'm asking for help.
Please let me die in your hands.
Go ahead, hit me! I want this pain to end…

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: If the character's HP falls to 20% or below, deal 30% of the target's max HP as damage upon approaching them and die.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: I am coming to you. You, who will be reduced to ash like me.

Dialogues.Dialogue: If I must perish, then join me.
It's just too sad to die alone… You know this feeling well, don't you?
Wait for me. I am coming to you, who will be reduced to ash…
Step by step... Burn into pitch black char.
Is there anything I can do, me, a scorched dark child?

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Take 1 less damage from attacks.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: “The charred body represents the child's crumbled hope, while the ever blazing flame represents the obsession for affection.”

Dialogues.Dialogue: To burn all things that are bright to ashes…
I know very well that my scorched body can't ever return to normal.
It's scary to turn to ashes… But I don't want this fire to go out.
I can feel happiness through the candlelight. And warmth…
Maybe I'll freely soar through the sky as ash one day.

AbnormalityCard.CardName: Nostalgic Embrace of the Old Days
AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Upon winning a clash, deal Stagger damage equal to the dice value at a 10% chance. Clashing against the same target multiple times will increase the likelihood.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Teddy was hugging someone tightly. Teddy loved hugs. But something was odd.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Give me a tight hug, will you? It'll soothe your mind.
Everyone loves hugs. Don't you agree?
Come over here and feel this fuzzy and warm feeling.
It's okay. Don't be afraid. All I do, is wrap you up in my arms.
You're tired, aren't you? Come take a rest in my embrace.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Choose the page with the highest Cost in hand. Using the pages with the same name will decrease the Cost of all pages with that name by 1.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: But, you see, Teddy never wanted to be separate from its owner ever again.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Why are you trying to leave me? We were such good friends…
Don't leave me. You'll change your mind when I hug you just once more.
It's too sad to say goodbye twice…
Why do you have to leave me and promise to meet again?
Have you come to dislike me because I hugged you too tight?

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: For three Scenes, all characters lose 3 Speed. For three Scenes, all characters lose 10% of their current HP and restore 1 Light at the start of the Scene.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Instead of visiting the ocean, the child was given candy which let him see the ocean. Many colorful nights and days passed.

Dialogues.Dialogue: I want to see the sea. The shining ocean waves…
Let us all watch the brilliant ocean tides together, sparkling in rainbow colors.
It makes me happy just looking at candy with the sea inside.
When you're looking at beautiful things, it's okay to take slow steps.
My eyes will be dyed in rainbow colors, too.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Gain 3 Speed.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Though the only thing the child could do was run around inside a cramped lab instead of a grass field under the sun, his steps were shaky but filled with enthusiasm.

Dialogues.Dialogue: What flavor of candy will I eat… It makes my heart flutter, you know?
I'm so excited, I just can't stand still.
Will I be able to run around in wider places one day?
I'm not wishing for things like vast meadows or warm sunlight.
I had a happy dream. A dream where I swam… in the sea.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: At the start of the Scene, each opponent gains a random 'Candy' at a 20% chance. Deals 50% more damage to targets carrying a 'Candy'. Deals 100% more damage to targets with 'Grape-Flavored Candy' instead.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Tell the kid today's treat is going to be grape-flavored candy. It's his favorite.

Dialogues.Dialogue: What flavor is today's candy gonna be?
Please tell me it's grape-flavored candy. It's my favorite.
It's okay, it doesn't always have to be grape-flavored.
For me, eating candy is like… moments of little pleasures.
After a delicious treat, I'll be able to happily fall asleep.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Gain Blurred for this Scene. Cannot act for this Scene. Heal 50% HP.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: However, this shelter, while perfectly safe on the inside, alters the reality of the outside to be even more hopeless.

Dialogues.Dialogue: This shelter can provide safety like no other place in this world.
Do not pay any attention to the noises coming from outside. Outside matters do not concern you.
You will be able to withstand an indefinite amount of time, if you have the will.
You will be safe as long as you stay inside.
Personal safety is the number one priority.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: All Offensive dice of all allies gain 0-1 Power. All Defensive dice of all allies lose 0-1 Power.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: It is still unknown what caused the collective rage among employees.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Help… There… monsters… … …pened.
Can y… … ar me? … …o, plea … … me.
… … requesting... … We need… … …ance…
A sudden appearanc… … … from… every… …
Emergency al… … … All personnel… … …evacua… …

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: When using a page, the damage of each roll is increased by the number of the Offensive dice.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: This is a recording of the day we must never forget. It brings us to a chaotic place—forgotten by many—that must never be forgotten.

Dialogues.Dialogue: We should never forget this day, even if it's gone from everyone else's memories…
If it's gotten blurry, then I'll repeat it for you anytime.
Remember. Do not erase this from your head. For any reason.
I hope you're keeping the radio at this frequency.
We'll have to remember this for a long time. This terrible incident.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Lose 2 Speed. Deal 1-3 more damage with attacks.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: He wears a straitjacket, but is as free as any man. No amount of chains and restraints is enough to prevent him from committing violence.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Even if my body is tied… I'll be as free as any man.
Release me… Why do I have to be bound!
Don't look at me with those eyes. You're the most pitiful ones here…
You're not going to keep me shackled with this!
I may be a mess now, but you'll have to fear me all the same.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Enhance Blunt dice.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: “My head... turning into metal... folds in my brain, being flattened...”

Dialogues.Dialogue: My head is ringing. I can hear the sound of metal, clear and loud…
It feels as if my head is turning to cold steel.
Is my head actually turning into metal?
When I bash my head onto a wall, it makes a refreshing sound.
If my head turns into steel, all the wrinkles in my brain will be gone.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Enhance Slash dice.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: However, the limbs were equipped with sharp instruments instead of cleaning supplies.

Dialogues.Dialogue: The helper-bot can help you with any household chores!
What kind of task do you want me to do? I can help with anything.
Contamination scan complete. Initiating cleaning protocol.
Beebeebeep~ Beep. Contamination spotted! Proceeding with trash disposal protocol.
I will help you with my wide selection of tools.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: At the end of each Scene, gain 3 Haste and 1 Strength if the character dealt 10 or more damage to enemies that Scene.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: The day I was sent to a new home for the first time, I gave them the gift they wanted so earnestly.

Dialogues.Dialogue: When I'm done cleaning, people would always praise me!
They're giving me orders with a loud voice. That means I'm doing a good job.
Beepboop~ Piii! Pattern data accumulated.
People love to shout when they compliment me.
The helper-bot has excellent learning capabilities.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: After engaging in a clash, inflict 2 Feeble and 2 Disarm to the opponent at a 25% chance.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Someone's persistent gaze can be felt from the keyhole inside the machine.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Whatever you do, the gaze will always linger on you.
Even if you try to escape the gaze, it'll be everywhere.
Have you ever found comfort in witnessing the misfortune of others?
It will never lose track of you, to the moment you give up everything.
There's no use turning around in anxiety.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: All dice gain 0-2 Power in clashes. All dice lose 0-2 Power in one-sided attacks.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: They faced towards the Abnormality for 10 seconds. After 5 seconds, it aggressively approached the employee. Experiment halted.

Dialogues.Dialogue: It feels awful to catch someone's gaze.
Don't place your gaze on me. Don't look at me.
If you won't turn away yourself, removing those eyes from your face is an option.
Only one of us has to be peeking.
I hate crossing my gaze with another's, it's as though I'm revealing something to them.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: The first die of each page only yields either the minimum or the maximum value.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Do you love your city?

Dialogues.Dialogue: Do you love the City?
Quick answers are appreciated.
You may answer "Yes" or "No" to the question.
If your answer is "No", then you unfortunately may not be discharged.
There is no obligation to answer "Yes", however… You understand where this is going, right?

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Whenever a page is used, discard a random page from the hand and restore 1 Light.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Just open up the machine, step inside, and press the button to make it shut. Now everything will be just fine.

Dialogues.Dialogue: This robot will change anything that does not please your mind.
Are you dissatisfied with your own strength? Do you find yourself too feeble?
We will change anything you find unsatisfying.
Everything will become better.
The interior provides optimal comfort, so have no concern.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Gain Blurred for the rest of the Scene. This character's attacks can no longer redirect the target.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: The area is a vacuum. Strictly speaking, the Abnormality itself is the vacuum phenomenon.

Dialogues.Dialogue: It will detach your limbs with earnesty.
If you want to leave in one piece that isn't just your torso, be aware of your surroundings.
All we can say is that you must stay cautious at all times.
Please ignore useless words of advice such as "Use your inner eye".
That area is essentially a vacuum. You won't be able to breathe.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Upon losing a clash, enhance the next Offense die at a 50% chance.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: It readjusts everyone to become righteous, no matter how wicked, evil, and arrogant they may be.

Dialogues.Dialogue: With the aid of this device, all people will be corrected to become righteous.
Do not rely too much on this device.
Do not stop thinking at all times while you are using this device.
It is advised against letting go of your willingness to adjust yourself too early.
We will correct your behavior.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: On a successful attack, if the dice rolled maximum value, deal 2-4 Stagger damage to the opponent and inflict 1 Fragile.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Unsurprisingly, not a single employee volunteered to retrieve the corpse of their cocooned colleague.

Dialogues.Dialogue: What careless fool stepped on my baby?
Few realized that the food inside my cocoons were not dead.
Spider's poison is unique, it prevents its victim from dying too quickly.
Watch your step. If you didn't, then watch your head.
No one dared to save my hunt.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: On a successful attack, recover 2-7 HP if the target is Staggered.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Peter was dragged to the ceiling in only a moment. The cocooned employee hanging off the ceiling of the Containment Unit will be a healthy meal for the spider's offspring.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Rejoice. You will bring joy to my offspring.
Growing children are always hungry.
It's all for our survival, it couldn't be helped.
It's relieving to have plenty of food.
Well now, we have a tasty meal ready for consumption… Come, children.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: The face constantly shifts. Dice gain different amounts of Power depending on the current face. (Min. -2, Max. +3)
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: One sunny day, just like that day they sincerely dried the laundry, they dried their own skin.

Dialogues.Dialogue: I'm just shy, that's all. Just shy…
A sad look doesn't fit the City.
It's very important to express oneself… I guess it is.
Please don't look at what's behind this. It's the least you can do.
Put a big smile on your face, like mine. It's not so hard, is it?

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: On a successful one-sided attack, inflict Solitude for 2 Scenes at a 15% chance. The chance is increased by 5% for every additional one-sided attack. Characters with Solitude lose 2 Speed and take 1-2 damage at the start of the Scene. (Does not stack)
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: She was so talkative before, yet in the end, loneliness was the only listener.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Child. Will you come next to me, so this old woman won't feel lonely?
No one visits me when I'm so old and dull.
In the end, this silence is my only listener.
Why won't anyone visit this poor old lady…
I fear I might end up being forgotten and meet a lonely end.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: The maximum Stagger Resistance value is lowered by 25%. Deal 1-2 more damage with attacks.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: It's not a good idea to keep listening to her. She knows every story on Earth and even those that cannot possibly exist.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Dearie, dearie… Would you like to hear an old story?
Yes, yes… What kind of stories do you like, little muffin?
Now, sit next to this old lady. I'll tell you a fun story.
Let's see… Would you like to sing a song about animal friends together?
This granny knows a lot of things. I can tell you all about it.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Deal 1-3 more damage when in a clash against an opponent with higher Speed.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Ah, screw it. Just enjoy looking at that flower all you want...

Dialogues.Dialogue: Enjoy looking at the flower… It'll be more comfortable that way...
You're already right on top of me… It's too late...
Don't worry… It won't take too long…
The food will naturally come to me…
All I do is close my jaws at the right time…

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: The opponent targeted by this character will be forced to attack them regardless of Speed. All Defense dice gain 0-1 Power.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: The bud is glowing, it's amazing. It's so bright, other employees came over to look at the flower too...

Dialogues.Dialogue: This lamp shines brightly in the dark…
Pretty, isn't it… Go ahead, come closer and take a good look...
Lighting up the dark isn't the only purpose of lamps…
They're naturally attracted by pretty things...
Just a little closer… Come near me… Just a tiny bit closer…

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: At the end of each Scene, if the character is at 20% HP or lower, gain Blurred for the next Scene.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: As it moves underground, not through the hallway, it is impossible to predict its path when breaching.

Dialogues.Dialogue: What's more important than baiting, is hiding…
To make sure that no one notices me… I should conceal myself…
If I stay here… No one will spot me…
Silently, in the dark… Wait for the prey…
They won't see what's coming, when I strike them…

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: On a successful attack, weaken the target's next Defense die at a 50% chance.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: At first, all I had to do was be lightly pricked by one of the thorns. Now I have to rub my whole body against it to get the same high.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Sure, I'll bend down for you~ Feel free to pet me.
It's scary at first, but the next step won't be difficult at all.
Come under me. I'll liberate you from all kinds of pain.
Just a little taste of the heaven won't hurt, right?
I pity those fools who don't know this happiness~

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Restore 2 Light after taking damage that exceeds 20% of the max HP. After taking a hit, die instantly if the HP drops below 25%.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Now it's time for my head to burst. Good day.

Dialogues.Dialogue: If you wish for unbearable pleasure, you'll break down eventually.
I'm just giving you laughter, so much that you might die laughing~
You'll start with one, and keep wanting more.
Your head will soon be filled with happiness, almost enough to burst your head.
Once you've had a taste of this sweetness, you can't quit.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: At the start of the Scene, each enemy is Allured at a 50% chance. Allured enemies gain 2-4 damage for their attacks, and prioritize this character as a target. Deal 3-5 more damage when attacking Allured targets.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: The shoes were colorless. They will soon turn red.

Dialogues.Dialogue: The red is so vivid, isn't it simply dazzling?
Once you get rid of that person… The shoes are all yours.
It's fine. It won't be hard to take the shoes off their feet if you chop at their ankles.
Don't you want to be the one shining the brightest here?
This glamour should be yours alone.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Gain 1 Speed. On a successful attack, inflict 1 Bleed at a 50% chance. When a Positive Coin is generated, generate a Negative Coin instead at a 50% chance.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: I’ll break your legs, then you won’t be able to dance ever again.

Dialogues.Dialogue: I should be the one in the spotlight!
Only I should perform an elegant dance…
I'll make you unable to dance forever.
If I rendered those legs unusable, could I take the position of the protagonist?
Show me your one last dance.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: When the character's HP is at 20% or below, destroy all dice of both themselves and the attacker at a 50% chance upon getting hit.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: You see a song in front of you. It's approaching, becoming more colorful by the second.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Sing. Perform. Human. Song. Ear. Listen.
Sings. Nerves. Focus. Moment. See. Exist.
Eye. Shut. Feel. Grandeur. Come. Happiness. Beyond.
Understand. Perfection. Moment. Know. Knowledge. Our. Meaning. Deliver.
Do. Together. Chant. Song. Enlightenment.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Enhance Pierce dice.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: The moment its tentacle penetrates you, it'll drain all the interest for the life you're currently living out of you.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Negative. Attack. Come. Help. Give.
Knowledge. Our. Simple. Give. Relay. None.
Human. Attack. I. Protect. Along. Attack.
Attack. Swift. Impale.
Human. Attack. Soul. Disappear. Gone. Want.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: When attacking the same target as the last Scene, restore 2-3 HP on each successful hit. When attacking a different target from the last Scene, take 1-2 damage on each successful hit.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Do you like it? More than you like me? Isn't it obvious? I know everything. Whatever you do, wherever you go.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Why did you visit that friend instead… Do you like them more than you like me?
I treasure you, but you won't treasure me…
Whatever you do, wherever you go… I'm always watching everything.
If you won't keep me company, then I don't need you.
Goodbye, don't come back to me again.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: On death, all characters take 25% of this character's max HP as damage.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: I hear his whispers and breath. Pitch black darkness follows... just like the night I met him...

Dialogues.Dialogue: Walk across the Milky Way with me.
You'll become a pebble, and join me.
Let's go back, just like that night.
I'm so glad to meet you.
If you find me crying again, then wipe my tears for me.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: For 3 Scenes, all allies restore 10% HP at the start of the Scene. When another ally dies, take 20% of the max HP as damage.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: The pebble dropped into your hand sparkles, sways, tickles, and eventually becomes the universe.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Don't lose it, and don't give it to anyone else.
It's my gift to celebrate our friendship. Please treasure it.
As long as you're holding it, I'll be right next to you.
You have to stay by my side forever, promise? Don't forget this.
If my friend gets hurt… That would be sad.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: On a successful attack, enhance the next Offense die at a 50% chance.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: But nothing could compare to the music it makes when it eats a human.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Nothing makes as fascinating music as a human can.
Don't you want to hear a beautiful song? You already know how.
Don't you worry. I'm sure that one wants to be a fine instrument, too.
People all carry musical talent in them.
Those who are fortitudinous, come to me. Join me.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: This character gains Rhythm. Characters with Rhythm have their Offense dice enhanced at a 50% chance, and take 1-3 additional damage on hit. Whenever a character with Rhythm kills an enemy, a random character who doesn't yet have Rhythm gains the status.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: It was creating a rhythm.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Everyone wants to hear my song again.
Various sounds join together to create music.
They're all volunteering to be instruments…
If everyone threw their bodies into me, it'll certainly create an even sweeter melody.
You won't want to hear any other music anymore.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: All characters take 2-4 additional Stagger damage upon taking hits.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: If you can only perceive the Abnormality as a giant mushroom, that's because you're seeing with clouded eyes

Dialogues.Dialogue: We can see the essence, unlike others.
It's quite a hard task to gain one's heart.
Approache me slowly, step after step.
You're not like the others, you can hear my voice.
Could you call us friends?

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Upon staggering an enemy, deal 5-7 damage to them.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Spring is coming. That was the magnificent beginning of my slow descent into despair.

Dialogues.Dialogue: I was born from earth, so now I yearn to return to it.
With unwithering flowers began my magnificent descent to despair.
I was adored by humans and wished to become one.
I am cracked, yet beautiful flowers fill that space.
Will you be the one to grant my wish?

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: At the end of each Scene, if the character used a page with three dice, deal 1-5 damage to all other characters and gain Blurred.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Shedding flower petals in place of tears, you spoke to me. "We were all part of earth once, so I plead you not to speak of the end here and now."

Dialogues.Dialogue: I have no eyes, but I can see everything.
Let us go back to the grave with all that lives and breathes.
My atonement ended with a heavy breath in the cold.
These flowers bloom without an end, and not one of them would wither.
I was abandoned in a dark forest, my mind and body withering away.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: After winning a clash, inflict 2 Bind and deal 1-2 Stagger damage at a 50% chance.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: With my infinite hatred, I give you this gift.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Merry children all deserve to have a gift!
With my infinite hatred, I give you this gift.
If you're happy even when tears are flowing down your cheek, then you may receive this gift.
Santa visits all joyous children.
If you aren't happy, then take my gift and be happy.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Increase Stagger Resist Recovery by 50%.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: “Do you remember this melody? The professor used to play this song when the students were sleepy. Happy birthday.”

Dialogues.Dialogue: Remember this melody?
Happy birthday. With love, Theresia.
Wind up the spring, and cure the ailing mind.
A long-haired child… Garden pranked with blossoms… And brother and sister.
Why is it that macabre can be felt in this melody?

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Lose 3 Speed. Enhance Defensive dice.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Unbearable depression overwhelms all who look into the bath.

Dialogues.Dialogue: That person simply couldn't take her sorrow in stride.
Can you withstand this deep despair?
Come inside. Get into this dreadful pool of blood.
Let go of it all, close your eyes, and sink into this bottomless pool.
No matter how much blood is added, the bathtub never overflows.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Take 1-5 less damage from Slash attacks.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: When I saw the latticework of scars on her severed wrist, I was reminded of our wine cabinet. That day, I popped the cork off the last one.

Dialogues.Dialogue: It takes a strong will and courage to cut your own wrist.
Don't call these people foolish. You're the biggest coward.
The scars are marks of failure, but they aren't worthless.
Caress this pain filling the tub softly.
The depth of a cut depends on the moment's mind and willpower.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: After every three clash losses, deal 2-10 Stagger damage to the opponent when rolling dice on the next clash.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Many hands float in the bath. They are the hands of the people I once loved.

Dialogues.Dialogue: The hands of one that you, perhaps we, loved are resting inside.
These hands are waiting for someone to hold them, would you grant their wishes?
No matter how much you wish to grasp what slips through your fingers…
These hands earnestly want help, yet no one bothers to give them a glance.
She must've trembled hard, the knife could slip from her hand at any moment.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: On a successful one-sided attack, inflict 1-2 Bind to target.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: A queen lives alone in the frosty winter forest.

Dialogues.Dialogue: The edge of this blade is sharp and cold.
Only the warmth of Spring can melt away this sword.
The straight blade knows exactly where to point itself to.
One day, when it gets warm enough for snow to melt, this sword too shall thaw away.
When this weapon impales your heart, you'll become oblivious of yourself for a moment.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: After winning 2 or more clashes within a single page, inflict Ice Splinter on the opponent. At the end of each Scene, characters with 3 or more Ice Splinters become immobilized for the next 2 Scene.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: The Snow Queen's kiss froze his heart, and he couldn't feel the cold anymore.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Only those who know of the scent of roses can bring an end to it all.
You must have had a warm heart once.
Forgetting the cold, forgetting the memories, and at last…
Could a frozen heart that's become numb to coldness thaw out?
Only the strong shall be able to rescue the frozen.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Deal 1-5 additional stagger damage upon successful attacks at 50% HP or below.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Spring arrived with blossoming roses. Its warmth melted the Snow Queen's palace. No one remembered her, sleeping underneath.

Dialogues.Dialogue: None will realize that I am slumbering in this place.
When this snow melts, I will also be forgotten.
Is my castle melting away, has the warm Spring truly arrived…
The full bloom of roses signal to me that Spring has come.
That person must not have wished for any more of this cold.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Add a 1 Cost <Learn> page to the hand: '[Start of Clash] Replace all dice with ones belonging to the opponent's page.'
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: All the child could do was 'learn' by observing others and mimicking their behavior. And that was the problem.

Dialogues.Dialogue: I'm keen to learn as usual. Would you like to see me learn?
People taught me how to speak.
I'm not a fast learner. I just mimic what I see.
It's not hard to mimic others. I don't have to think.
I've learned lots of things, but I never go anywhere.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: At the start of the Scene, shuffle the hand into the draw pile, and draw 6 pages.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: People lie all the time. Why is that a bad thing?

Dialogues.Dialogue: People love to say things the other way round.
They said it wasn't for themselves. They were lying for the good of everyone…
Lalala… I sing along to the song of lies all the people sing.
I see the world upside down, as people have taught me.
Everyone lies, why are you saying it's a bad thing?

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Deal 1-5 additional stagger damage upon winning a clash.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: However, when she met a person carrying 'guilt' or 'fear', the girl revealed the nail and hammer she had been hiding behind her back.

Dialogues.Dialogue: I wonder if there's a crack in your mind that I could hammer a nail in?
When a nail drives into a fissure, it gets twice as wide.
You should've been quick to deal with baggages in your mind.
Nothing hurts as much as a nail down the chest.
Dear, you seem to be quite… afraid, aren't you?

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Reduce the maximum Stagger Resist value (Min. 0%, Max. 50%), and Gain Speed (Min. 1, Max. 5) and damage (Min. 1-1, Max. 1-5). The change becomes more drastic with the amount of Negative Coins.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: To repeat once again, the girl remains silent. She would simply glare at the core of one's inner side with her deep eyes.

Dialogues.Dialogue: You stole something when you were a kid, didn't you.
You're still holding onto those painful memories... You poor fellow.
Did you know? Because of the misdeed you committed, that person…
Don't shift the responsibility on others. The agony is yours to carry.
Oh, you absolutely could've done it. You were just too busy running away.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: At the start of the Scene, randomize the Costs of all pages.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Those who face themselves in the mirror may appear the same, but in actuality, they have become completely different people.

Dialogues.Dialogue: The satisfaction is only temporary.
Are you unsatisfied with your current self?
Those who face the mirror would become completely different people in essence.
I don't recommed looking into the mirror twice even if you're still not satisfied with your new self, though.
When you look into the mirror twice, it'll eat away your humanity.

AbnormalityCard.AbilityDesc: Increase Max HP by 40%. Gain 3 Speed. At the end of each Scene, if the character did not deal any damage with Offensive dice, lose 10% of the current HP.
AbnormalityCard.FlaborText: Excessive aspiration would bring about unwarranted frenzy.

Dialogues.Dialogue: Overwhelming aspiration is what leads to wrongful frenzy.
Why won't you wish for anything when you've earned such power?
He who holds power should rightfully wield it.
Yes, feel the rapid beating of your heart.
It seems we have a common goal we're desperately wishing for, so allow us to help.
